MemoryInfobox.name: A Great Escape
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Exhasusted by the trials of her daily life, Kassandra decided to consider taking a much-needed rest away to recuperate.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories'

General_Description: '''A Great Escape''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Tired after so many years fighting and starting to realize the full burden of the task [[Aletheia]] had given her as immortal Keeper of the [[Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff]] of [[Hermes Trismegistus]], Kassandra returned to [[Kephallonia]] hoping to quietly retreat from society.
Section_Dialogue:
While passing through [[Sami]]'s port, Kassandra saw a woman calling out to [[Civilian|passersby]] from where she stood on the quay by a docked [[ship]]. *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''Come sail away! Find your bliss on [[Korfu]]! [[Boat]]s leaving daily!'' Interested, Kassandra walked up and spoke to the cruise barker. [[File:ACOD A Great Escape 2.png|thumb|250px|The cruise barker pitching the island of Korfu as a vacation destination]] *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''Care to visit paradise, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Paradise? Does the boat go to [[Elysium]]?'' *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''To Korfu Island! A land with no work and all play. A vacation destination.'' Kassandra shook her head. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Vacation? What's that?'' *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''A state of mind. Where your only responsibility is to get much-needed rest. It's a new concept.'' Kassandra smiled at the thought of finally relaxing. *'''Kassandra:''' ''It does sound tempting.'' *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''There are no clearer waters than off the coast of Korfu...'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''How about [[soldier]]s? Criminals? ''People''. That's who I ''really'' need a break from.'' The sales woman laughed. *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''If there are, they're too busy relaxing. Can I interest you in today's passage?'' ("I'll take the vacation")
Kassandra put her hand to her chin in thought. [[File:ACOD A Great Escape 3.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra departing for Korfu for a vacation]] *'''Kasssandra:''' ''It's just what I need. Vacation. For a couple of days, at least.'' *'''Cruise Barker:''' ''Then step aboard. Your next destination: bliss.'' Kassandra followed the cruise barker as she walked to the docking ramp and boarded the ship.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra decided to take some time for herself and relax on the relatively secluded island of Korfu.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This memory is only accessable after players have completed "[[The Big Break]]" and reached [[Megaris]], afterwhich they can find the quest giver back at Sami's port on Kephallonia. Since the memory arc references events from the end of ''Odyssey''{{'}}s main plot as well as both its expansions ''[[Legacy of the First Blade]]'' and ''[[The Fate of Atlantis]]'', it is strongly suggested that new players not start this sequence until after completing the game in its entirety.
